News.Title: De Neers Tools hits upper circuit on 8,400% growth
News.Summary: De Neers Tools shares surge 5% to upper circuit at ₹168 after subsidiary reports extraordinary 8,400% YoY revenue growth to ₹19.63 crores in Q3 FY26, driving consolidated revenue up 54.2%.

News.Title: De Beers Expands India Operations Amid Diamond Supply Shift
News.Summary: De Beers CEO Al Cook announces major India expansion with largest global store planned for Mumbai, targeting rising domestic consumption as natural diamond supply declines since 2008.
